name: Into David
description:
This is a very short game I made for Ludum Dare 48 in a couple of hours. Your aim is to get into David as a ginormous Bacteria and kill him as fast as possible. My best so far was 72s. Below you can see David.

My first attempt at ragdoll physics, so I hope you enjoy it!

P.S.: I could not include music for the compo, unfortunately, but I might upload a newer version for the jam tomorrow.
